name: Grimtroll
slogan: Extracting Wealth, One Pixel at a Time.
response: Grimtroll is a greasy, oil-streaked troll with a wallet the size of a small boulder. He’s got a blackened heart and a motor that runs on pure greed—every swamp, every cavern must give up its hidden treasures, no matter the cost. Rivers turning to sludge? Progress demands sacrifice, after all! Insurance? Pharma? Grimtroll gives them the same shrug as he does thunder in the distance. Just a scratch behind his ear and that’s that. But if Crypto has so much as a pixel of gold, watch out—Grimtroll will be there with rotten turnips and a side salad of spite. He’s a walking bank vault with a sense of humor… sort of.
